parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of components for collision detection

parameters.name: ComponentArray
parameters.description: Array of components for collision detection

parameters.name: PartOnly
parameters.description: True checks for collisions with only the components that you selected to move, false check for collisions in all affected components

parameters.name: StopAt
parameters.description: True stops the motion of the component when it touches any other entity, false does not

title: IDragOperator.ICollisionDetection

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of components for collision detection

parameters.name: ComponentArray
parameters.description: Array of components for collision detection

parameters.name: PartOnly
parameters.description: True checks for collisions with only the components that you selected to move, false check for collisions in all affected components

parameters.name: StopAt
parameters.description: True stops the motion of the component when it touches any other entity, false does not

returns: True if successful, false if not
